name: The Apeman Strikes Again
overview: The 'Apeman Strikes Again' is a well done and clone of Nintendo's 'Donkey Kong' (that was released on the MSX) and an underappreciated game on the MSX. 'He is coming for you!' is an unforgettable line just like the evil laughter you hear when Mario falls to his death. The game contains all 4 levels.
